title: Ajay Kshemkalyani, University of Illinois at Chicago
contents:
Ajay Kshemkalyani,  Professor          Contact:  Email:  first_name (AT) uic.edu voice: (312) 355-1309 fax: (312) 413-0024 office: Room SEO 915   Postal/courier address:  Department of Computer Science University of Illinois at Chicago 851 S. Morgan Street Chicago, IL 60607-7053        Research      Areas: Distributed computing, Distributed algorithms, concurrent systems, software systems   Publications list and brief bio ; 
Publications as per DBLP ; Google Scholar ; Profile in Google Scholar  I am looking to work with motivated PhD students.
Check out this students page
and contact me if interested.    Education and Experience     Professor, Computer Science Department,  University of Illinois at Chicago  and Adjunct Professor, Electrical and Computer Engineering Department  Spent several years at IBM Research Triangle Park M.S., Ph.D., Computer Science & Engg., The Ohio State University  B. Tech., Computer Science and Engg., Indian Institute
   of Technology, Bombay     Other Activity     Editor, Computer Networks (Elsevier), (2004 - 2010) Associate Editor, IEEE Transactions on Parallel and Distributed Systems, (2010 - 2014)         textbook (2011 edition)    A.D. Kshemkalyani, M. Singhal, Distributed Computing: Principles, Algorithms, and Systems, ISBN: 9780521189842, paperback edition,
Cambridge University Press, March 2011. 756 pages.    South Asian reprint edition, 2010.
ISBN-10: 1107648904, ISBN-13: 978-1107648906    Book web site, with chapter slides       Teaching      Spring  2020    CS 401 Computer Algorithms TR 3:30 - 4:45pm in TBH 180F  CS 566 Parallel Processing  TR 2:00 - 3:15pm in TBH 180C        Miscellaneous
